channel.description: Recent content in SQL on 文翼的博客

item.title: SQL学习笔记——DDL
item.description: ​1. CREATE DATABASE Syntax • CREATE DATABASE database_name ​2. CREATE TABLE Syntax • CREATE TABLE table_name ( column_name1 data_type, column_name2 data_type, column_name3 data_type, ) ​3. SQL Constraints • NOT NULL - cannot insert a new record, or update a record without adding a value to this field • UNIQUE - uniquely identifies each record in a table • PRIMARY KEY • FOREIGN KEY (REFERENCES)

item.title: SQL学习笔记——DDL
item.description: ​1. CREATE DATABASE Syntax • CREATE DATABASE database_name ​2. CREATE TABLE Syntax • CREATE TABLE table_name ( column_name1 data_type, column_name2 data_type, column_name3 data_type, ) ​3. SQL Constraints • NOT NULL - cannot insert a new record, or update a record without adding a value to this field • UNIQUE - uniquely identifies each record in a table • PRIMARY KEY • FOREIGN KEY (REFERENCES)

item.title: SQL学习笔记——DML
item.description: ​1. What is SQL (1) SQL stands for Structured Query Language (2) SQL is an ANSI standard (3) RDBMS(Relational Database Managerment System) is the basis for SQL like SQLServer, DB2, Oracle, MySQL, and Access eg. ​2. SQL DML and DDL (1) The query and update commands from the DML(Data Manipulation Language) part of SQL: • SELECT - extracts data from a database • UPDATE - updates

item.title: SQL学习笔记——DML
item.description: ​1. What is SQL (1) SQL stands for Structured Query Language (2) SQL is an ANSI standard (3) RDBMS(Relational Database Managerment System) is the basis for SQL like SQLServer, DB2, Oracle, MySQL, and Access eg. ​2. SQL DML and DDL (1) The query and update commands from the DML(Data Manipulation Language) part of SQL: • SELECT - extracts data from a database • UPDATE - updates
